description: This file contains unit tests for the notesReducer function, which manages the state of notes in a notes management application. It uses testing functions like describe and test to define multiple test cases that verify the behavior of the reducer with various actions, such as loading notes, updating, deleting, and toggling pin states.

methods.name: makeNote(id, updatedAt = "2020-01-01T00:00:00.000Z", extra = {})
methods.description: Helper function to create a note object with specified id, updatedAt timestamp, and extra properties.
